attributes.action: REDUCE FUEL TAX ON PETROL, DIESEL AND LPG FUELS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE REQUEST THAT ALL FUEL TAX IS REDUCED TO KEEP PRICES AFFORDABLE
WE REQUEST THIS CAPPED FEE AS THE GOVERMENT AND FUEL PRODUCERS HAVE NOT PROVIDED AN ALTERNATIVE AFFORDABLE FUEL FOR EXISTING VEHICLES.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
